description: Cancels one or more Capacity Reservation Fleets. When you cancel a Capacity Reservation Fleet, the following happens:

parameters.name: CapacityReservationFleetIds
parameters.description: The IDs of the Capacity Reservation Fleets to cancel. (string) ---

nested_items.name: SuccessfulFleetCancellations
nested_items.description: Information about the Capacity Reservation Fleets that were successfully cancelled.

nested_items.name: CurrentFleetState
nested_items.description: The current state of the Capacity Reservation Fleet.

nested_items.name: PreviousFleetState
nested_items.description: The previous state of the Capacity Reservation Fleet.

nested_items.name: CapacityReservationFleetId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Capacity Reservation Fleet that was successfully cancelled.

nested_items.name: FailedFleetCancellations
nested_items.description: Information about the Capacity Reservation Fleets that could not be cancelled.

nested_items.name: CapacityReservationFleetId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Capacity Reservation Fleet that could not be cancelled.

nested_items.name: CancelCapacityReservationFleetError
nested_items.description: Information about the Capacity Reservation Fleet cancellation error.
